text: <@U0VKPD6A2> - Yes I am following the steps on the tutorial page
<@U10MXEXL3>: great.  do you see the txnvalidator file in /project/sawtooth-validator/bin ?
<@U0VKPD6A2>: yes there is a txnvalidator file in /project/sawtooth-validator/bin
This should be ran from the sawtooth-validator ./bin/txnvalidator -v --http 8800 --config /project/sawtooth-docs/source/tutorial/txnvalidator.js
<@U10MXEXL3>: were you in the correct directory?
Yes I am I think it is an environment issue a simple echo directly after '#!/usr/bin/env python' does not result in any output, just the original error
Fixed it. The file had a CR-LF after the '#!/usr/bin/env python' line. Thanks to <http://askubuntu.com/questions/372672/what-could-cause-a-script-to-fail-to-find-python-when-it-has-usr-bin-env-pyt>

attachments.title: what could cause a script to fail to find python when it has `#!/usr/bin/env python` in the first line?
attachments.text: Trying to get casperjs running on Ubuntu 12.04. After installing it when I run I get: 09:20 $ ll /usr/local/bin/casperjslrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 26 Nov 6 16:49 /usr/local/bin/casperjs -> /opt/
attachments.fallback: what could cause a script to fail to find python when it has `#!/usr/bin/env python` in the first line?

text: Now I get the error: ImportError: No module named sawtooth.config
I see it under sawtooth-core
<@U10MXEXL3>: what does ‘echo $PYTHONPATH’ get you?
.:/projects/sawtooth-core
I think my env is hosed. I needed to perform many more pythin related installs than indicated in the tutorial.
interesting, so when you checked it out from git, it must be converting the files to CRLF?
good point
if so, the solution would be to re-clone the repos with (perhaps) --config core.autocrlf=input
I'm not usually a windows user, so haven't tried that
if it fixes the issue though, we could update our tutorial with (at least) a note
my read of the git docs though, suggests that setting would still convert it to CRLF on checkout, but <@U0Y4ZF0QM> claims that's his setting on Windows
thx
<@U1ADSTE0N|viewer> has joined the channel
